items.companyName: 北京万维盈创科技发展
items.fullCompanyName: 北京万维盈创科技发展有限公司
items.jobDescribe:
岗位职责：
1. 负责公司人力资源管理工作，完成招聘、培训、企业文化等工作；
2. 制定招聘计划，输出岗位职责，维护招聘渠道，负责招聘全流程的落地工作（包括：简历筛选、电话沟通、初试、复试跟踪、录用、试用期管理等）；
3. 负责培训体系、课程体系的建立，建立培训讲师制度与文化塑造；作为培训讲师，完成通用型素质课程的开发与培训讲授；
4. 负责公司企业文化活动的策划与实施，营造良好的企业文化氛围，增强企业凝聚力。

任职要求：
1.本科及以上学历，人力资源管理、工商管理、汉语言文学、心理学等相关专业；
2.1-3年以上人力资源工作经验，科技类型公司工作背景优先考虑；
3.在招聘管理或培训开发模块有较为敏锐的理解与实战经验；
4.具备优秀的沟通表达能力，善于总结与分析，逻辑思维严谨；
5.具备优秀的职业素养，成就导向意识强烈，抗压能力强。

福利待遇：
1.富有市场竞争力的岗位薪酬+各类生活补助（全勤奖、午餐补助、通讯补助）+丰厚奖金（年终奖、项目奖金、绩效奖金等）+每年一次涨薪机会；
2.六险一金、补充商业险、重要节日慰问礼金，周末双休、旅游团建、健康体检、结婚礼金、通勤班车等。

培养体系：
1.个性化成长地图：入职导师1V1定制培养计划+系统性公司级培训+部门持续性业务培训+公派培训，多维度培养机制，聚焦个性化发展需要构建成长地图，提升专业技能与职业素养；
2.全方位培训形式：线下阶段性统一培训指导+E-learning 学习平台随时随地学习充电；
3.双通道人才发展规划：“专业序列+管理序列”双通道晋升机制，多岗位轮换，实现人才多元化发展。

发展空间：
1.纵向：HRBP经理
2.横向：培训经理、招聘经理等

items.fullCompanyName: 深圳市北测检测技术有限公司
items.jobDescribe:
工作职责:
1、参与业务单元的人力资源管理政策调研、制定，负责推动落地执行和方案推进；
2、制定、组织实现业务单位的人力资源规划配置；
3、挖掘业务单位岗位人力需求，协助招聘模块或通过内部调动满足用人需要；
4、根据分析绩效指标达成与改善的结果为依据，优化业务单位绩效方案、完善考核指标，并推动落地。
5、负责部门招聘目标达成，及时引进关键人才；
6、负责企业人才库更新，为公司提供有价值的行业人才信息；
7、统计及汇总相关招聘数据，参与校招物资等招聘文案策划；
8.完成领导安排的其它任务。

任职资格:
1、统招本科学历，人力资源管理或行政管理专业优先；
2、3年以上工作经验，具备优秀的文案及策划能力，有一定的数据分析能力;
3、有较强的抗压能力、执行力、学习能力、协调沟通及表达能力，具备良好的团队合作意识及较高的人际敏感度。

我们的工作时间：
公司实行5天工作制 周一至周五 08:30-12:00 13:30-18:00
（PS每月最后一个周六上班一天，9：00-12：00 13：30-17：30）

如果您加入北测检测的大家庭，您将获得：
* 良好的工作环境和人性化的管理制度及亲善可爱的同事们。
* 五险一金：试用期即按国家规定购买养老保险、失业保险、工伤保险、医疗保险、生育保险、商业保险和住房公积金；
* 带薪假期：享有带薪年休假、法定节假日、孕产假（产假、孕检假、陪产假、哺乳假）、病假、丧假等假期；
* 生日关怀：员工生日，享有生日福利；
* 节日关怀：端午节、中秋节、春节、三八节等节日礼品；
* 文娱活动：不定期组织聚餐、羽毛球、篮球活动等户外活动（公司配有篮球场）；
* 年终奖金：根据公司营业情况年底享用奖金；
* 培训：定期组织系统的培训体系以及完善的晋升体系（入职培训、岗位培训、职业规划等）提供横向、纵向良好的发展平台；
* 公司配有食堂，解决你的温饱问题；
* 提供住宿：公司为员工提供良好的住宿环境（空调、热水器、饮水机、洗衣机齐全）。

北测检测期待您的加入！

items.fullCompanyName: 同策房产咨询股份有限公司（集团）
items.jobDescribe:
岗位职责：
1、制定、完善符合公司发展需求的考核制度跟进绩效实施情况，进行绩效评估、分析与优化工作，实现组织效能提高；
2、根据公司战略发展需要，协助各级部门对组织架构、职责分工和人才发展进行定期盘点和评估，负责有关工作规划及方案落地，提升组织发展能力；
3、根据考核结果，提出各级人员的薪酬调整、职位调动等，为领导决策提供决策支持
4、负责参与编制公司全年人事行政预算，保证各类费用合理分配支出；
5、关注市场变化趋势，分析市场薪酬数据，建立适合公司的激励体系，及时调整绩效考核方案及激励政策；
6、组织效能管理分析，搭建现阶段适合业务发展的组织模式，人员结构和人员配置，为组织效能优化提供决策建议；
7、持续优化关键岗位及关键人才的管理体系，并推动相关业务单元的关键人才管理工作，包括关键岗位识别、岗位能力梳理、人才梯队建设和人才评估等。
任职资格：
1、本科及以上学历，五年以上人力资源相关工作经验；
2、熟悉人力资源各大模块，能根据业务发展的需要搭建HRBP人力资源管理体系；
3、具有优秀的组织沟通能力，能协调内部资源与他人合作达成成果；
4、具有较强的抗压力和应变能力，能适应高强度的工作节奏并快速相应。

1、支持业务部门的人力资源管理工作； 
2、作为业务需求的管理者，深入了解业务需求与痛点，通过链接HR平台，为业务提供解决方案，解决业务需求与痛点；

1、本科及以上学历，5年以上高科技企业人力资源管理工作经验； 
2、具备良好的业务理解能力与HR专业能力； 
3、具备良好的人际理解力、沟通能力、自我驱动力。

items.jobDescribe:
1、参与各部门岗位的工作分析工作，并形成有效的岗位说明书；
2、根据岗位的不同属性，确定市场价值、选择招聘渠道、组织初试、复试、背调、薪酬谈判、offer等工作；
3、负责各部门的新员工入职培训、日常培训组织实施等工作，并形成有效闭环；
4、负责各部门的绩效管理工作，确保绩效管理工作的有效推进；
5、协助各部门通过绩效体系完成员工异动工作；
6、协助各部门制定符合组织效率的年度目标及年度人力资源规划；
7、了解员工心声，能够站公司立场宣导企业文化、价值观，创建积极向上的办公氛围；
8、上级安排的其他工作事项。
任职资格：
1、本科及以上学历，人力资源相关专业。
2、3年及以上薪酬单模块工作经验，熟练掌握Excel技能及数据分析能力。
3、具备较强的沟通能力、抗压能力、性格开朗、感染力、推动力强。

PBEs to support all recruitment activities including: recruitment needs 
consolidated and analysis; face to face interview, work with People Service 
team to ensure hiring effectiveness and maximize recruiting efficiency;
 3. Be responsible for employee lifecycle management in the responsible area 
from PBE side to create good employee experiences;
 4. Support the recognition and reward programs to drive the employee at high 
engagement level.
 5. Proactive engagement in the various employee relation matters in both 
office and technicians, be able to explain company rules and regulations in a 
professional manner
 6. Support performance development process
 7. Support the employee survey and other PX activities to ensure the positive 
employee relations
 8. Work with business team to drive competence development especially FVC 
engineering development
 9. Support and coordinate management team to assure the employees discipline 
in place.
 Job Requirements:
 1. University degree in Business Administration or HR management is preferred
 2. Above 8 years’ experience as HR Professional working cross the core PX 
functions with the specific experience in one expert area. HR BP experience in 
business functions is preferred.
 3. High learning agility and good analytical thinking.
 4. Good communication and coordination skill. Being down-to-earth, hands-on 
and detail-oriented.
 5. Able to work under high pressure & complex environment with “can-do” 
attitude
 6. English language should be fluent both in the spoken and written form.

items.fullCompanyName: 北京ABB开关有限公司
items.jobDescribe:
As a core member of the local Business Management Team, provide on-location HR
 support in the assigned geographic area to employees including managers to 
ensure
 effective and sustainable workplace relations and performance in close 
collaboration
 with HR network. Apply HR policies defined by Group Centers of Expertise 
(CoE),
 including on Labor Relations as defined in each country with Country HR. 
Ensures &
 assures local compliance.
 Main
 Accountabilities:
 1. Strategy Alignment Implement HR priorities in the organization in line 
with group/ global division /
 global BU / global function and people strategy, covering culture, people, and
 organization utilizing the existing HR solution portfolio or ensuring to 
provide
 new solutions where appropriate.
 Orchestrate the HR organization to support and deliver on the defined
 priorities.
 2. HR Solutions Partner with managers and employees in the relevant location 
to understand
 current issues that can be supported or resolved through HR practices,
 processes, or policies.
 Counsel Managers and employees on the most effective solutions to resolve
 issues.
 Acts as consultant, sparring partner, coach, and facilitator to business 
leaders.
 3. HR Process Implementation Oversee implementation of HR processes at the 
location, ensuring compliance
 with Group policy and guidelines.
 Provides feedback and inputs on relevant local statutory or regulatory
 requirements into the development and implementation of new or improved
 processes/products/services.
 4. Performance Management Support manager and HRBP to implement and follow up 
performance
 management activities on the site, including poor performance improvement,
 PDA discussion, training need identification, termination, and etc.
 Support the implementation of group and global recognition program.
 5. Integrated Talent Works closely with Talent Partners to ensure a healthy 
and sustainable talent
 pipeline in the organization considering internal Talent pool and external
 market.
 Drives and executes all talent processes with Business Leaders e.g.
 identification and succession planning on business critical positions, 
diversity
 and inclusion and owns the talent outcomes.
 Where appropriate is directly involved in the recruitment of peer level 
positions.
 Assess risks and coordinate actions to mitigate risks.
 6. Learning & Development Partner with business leaders to understand and 
identify learning requirements
 for both individuals and critical populations at a local level.
 Collaborates with Learning Partners to decide appropriate learning strategies
 and commission design and execution of customized programs to meet the
 needs identified.
 Measures and evaluates effectiveness of learning solutions to demonstrate
 business impact.
 7. Retention and Engagement Monitors employee turnover data and put measures 
in place to support
 achievement of optimal levels of attrition across the site.
 Assess employee engagement and morale and take actions to address issues.
 8. Employee Relations Represent HR in the workplace, build partnerships 
between employees, HR and
 Managers.
 Deliver day to day HR management contact / relationship for employees,
 including employee welfare, counselling, grievance redressal, disciplinary
 processes; Facilitate changes.
 Carry out training and communication on HR strategy, policy, and processes
 when necessary.
 Lead discussions and owns the relationship with local collective bargaining 
and
 information/consultation groups where applicable (e.g. works councils, trade
 unions, employee committees).
 9. Labor Relations Follow policies and instructions set by CoE and Country HR 
and in close
 collaboration with CoE and GBS to oversee activities regarding labor relations
 and organized labor within area of responsibility.
 Manage resolution of labor relations crises which impact at a local level,
 ensuring necessary flow of information to all stakeholders.
 Build and manage constructive relationships with both internal and external
 labor relations stakeholders at a local level, in order to support a culture 
of
 mutually beneficial cooperation between HR, line managers, employees and
 their representatives.
 Advise and proactively communicate with local business leaders, relevant HR
 stakeholders and the Legal function regarding requirements in labor relations,
 forthcoming legislation, etc.
 10. Standards and Governance Implement and ensure compliance with global and 
local standards, rules, tools,
 policies and processes related to operations/project execution.
 Share and develop best practices across the wider HR community

岗位内容：
1.根据集团战略，制定产品线具体的人力资源规划政策，督促并执行各项人力资源流程及制度；

3.负责根据总部要求，推进蓝领和白领绩效管理；
4.负责制定和管理产品线年度培训计划，集团的资源支持下，培养和发展各层级员工；
5.负责根据产品线运营情况，管控人员编制，并及时进行人员增补与新员工的融入，满足人力资源需求；
6.负责根据集团和产品线的要求落实人力成本管理；
7.主导公司内核心价值观的践行，推行产品线文化，建立高效合一的团队文化；
岗位要求：
1.本科及以上学历，人力资源、工商管理等相关专业； 
2.通晓掌握人力资源管理各模块，具备较为规范、系统的人力资源知识与实践经验；熟悉人力资源管理各项事务工作流程； 
3.具有8年以上机械制造业人力资源管理实战经验，同等职位3年以上工作经验；整车或者汽车零部件行业从业背景优先；有海外HR工作经验优先； 
4.具有较强的业务链接能力、组织策划能力、沟通协调能力，较强的抗压能力和勇于挑战的精神；
5.英语书面及沟通能力良好，可作为工作语言尤佳；
6.可接受短期的国内外出差或者全球流动工作；
